markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inventor Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3112) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Inventor](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=108)

**Prerequisites**
Intelligence 14

</column>

---

You become trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) and inventor class DC. You gain the [Inventor](/Feats.aspx?ID=798) skill feat, even if you don't meet the skill feat's requirements. Choose an [innovation](/classes/inventor/innovations). You gain that innovation, though you don't gain any other abilities that modify or use that innovation, such as modifications or [Explode](/Actions.aspx?ID=902).

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have first gained two other feats from the inventor archetype.

<title level="2">Inventor Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Breakthrough](/Feats.aspx?ID=3113), [Basic Modification](/Feats.aspx?ID=3117), [Brilliant Crafter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3114), [Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3116)
name: Inventor Dedication
